law.text:
In addition to the performance of all duties relating to the Department of Kentucky State Police, the department shall perform the following functions:
Security of state facilities located in Frankfort;
Highway enforcement; and
Water safety enforcement as provided in KRS Chapter 235.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 59, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 13, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1980.
